regex: certificate has expired or is not yet valid
message_cn: 当前系统时间不在镜像仓库证书有效期内
message_en: current System time has expired for imagestore certification
operation_cn: 检查镜像服务器系统时间，或重置镜像仓库证书
operation_en: check System time on imagestore server or reset imagestore certifaction
extension_cn: 可能需要把 /var/lib/zstack/imagestorebackupstorage/package/certs/ 清空，并修改数据库
causes_cn: 调整过镜像仓库服务器的系统时间，或者证书被修改
causes_en: adjust system time on imagestore server, or modified certification
